name: URL Monitor
description: Distributed URL monitoring system with real-time health checks, custom alerting, and comprehensive Datadog Agent integration for metrics, logs, and distributed tracing.
shortDescription: Distributed URL monitoring with real-time health checks and full Datadog Agent integration for metrics, logs, and traces.
details: Implemented telemetry pipeline with StatsD metrics for latency/error rates, structured file-based logging with automatic ingestion, and dd-trace-go for request-level tracing
Containerized with Docker and orchestrated multi-container deployment via Docker Compose and Kubernetes (Minikube)
Deployed React/TypeScript frontend on Vercel and Go backend on Fly.io

name: MultiOmic Phenotypic Data Search
description: ETL pipeline querying PubMed & dbGaP with advanced visualization for biomedical researchers.
shortDescription: ETL pipeline querying PubMed & dbGaP with advanced visualization for biomedical researchers.
details: Unifies study, sample, and assay records from PubMed, GEO, ENA, dbGaP, and BioStudies into a single searchable schema
Orchestrated an asynchronous ingestion layer (aiohttp + asyncio) and vectorized clustering logic, shrinking metadata harvest time from 60 min to < 8 min
Built a fault-tolerant ETL pipeline on AWS (EC2 + S3, IAM-scoped roles, CloudWatch alerts)

name: RefuConnect
description: Real-time multilingual platform connecting refugees with resources. 2nd place at HopHacks.
shortDescription: Real-time multilingual platform connecting refugees with resources. 2nd place at HopHacks.
details: Implemented real-time chat feature with WebSockets for instant communication
Integrated Google Translate API for automatic message translation
Built responsive React front-end with intuitive user interface

name: CUNY to Calendar
description: Chrome extension letting CUNY students export class schedules directly to Google Calendar.
shortDescription: Chrome extension letting CUNY students export class schedules directly to Google Calendar.
details: Built a chrome extension that allows CUNY students to easily add their classes to their Google Calendar
Used ICS library to parse the class schedule
Integrated custom API to scrape the class schedule

name: Code Whisperer
description: VSCode extension using Faster-Whisper for real-time code transcription with instant feedback.
shortDescription: VSCode extension using Faster-Whisper for real-time code transcription.
details: Implemented a VSCode extension that uses OpenAI's API to type code for you
Integrated Faster-Whisper for real-time transcription of code
Added features like switching between lines, adjusting already typed code

name: Discord Job Tracker Bot
description: Discord bot that tracks job applications and provides status updates.
shortDescription: Discord bot that tracks job applications and provides status updates.
details: Built a REST API using Flask and SQLite to store job application data
Implemented a Discord bot using Discord.py that allows users to track their job applications
Integrated options like update, export, list by company, and list by status
